name: Google+ with auto-hide toolbars and translucent
description:
Make the left, top, right bar auto-hide.
Also make elements translucent.
additional_info:
This css need "calc" support in your browser.
Compatible Browsers:
IE 9+
Firefox 12+
Chrome 18+

To use custom background image, you need fill the location of the image above.
